scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix backend install && pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum install
scripts.dev:solana: title Solana && docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold" --names "HARDHAT,CONTRACTS,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SOLANA" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "node scripts/deploy-with-delay.js" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.dev:full:no-deploy: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgCyan.bold" --names "HARDHAT,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SOLANA" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.dev:full:with-solana: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold" --names "HARDHAT,CONTRACTS,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SOLANA" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "node scripts/deploy-with-delay.js" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.dev:quiet: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-length 2 --names "H,C,B,F,S" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "node scripts/deploy-with-delay.js" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.dev:quiet:no-deploy: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-length 2 --names "H,B,F,S" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.solana:reset: docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up -d solana-validator
scripts.build:all: pnpm compile && pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:frontend
scripts.clean: pnpm --prefix contracts clean && pnpm --prefix frontend clean && pnpm --prefix backend clean
